00023 class TSyncProcessorWrap: public Base

00070 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::GetProcessorState(const iprm::IParamsSet* /*paramsPtr*/) const

00072        return IProcessor::PS_READY;

00076 template <class Base>
00077 void TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::ResetAllTasks()
00078 {
00079        m_taskToStateMap.clear();
00080 }

00092 
00093 template <class Base>
00094 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::BeginTask(
00095                      const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00096                      const istd::IPolymorphic* inputPtr,
00097                      istd::IChangeable* outputPtr,
00098                      IProgressManager* progressManagerPtr)
00099 {
00100        int retVal = m_nextTaskId;
00101        m_taskToStateMap[retVal] = this->DoProcessing(paramsPtr, inputPtr, outputPtr, progressManagerPtr);
00102 
00103        m_nextTaskId = (m_nextTaskId + 1) & 0x7fff;
00104 
00105        return retVal;
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 template <class Base>
00110 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::WaitTaskFinished(
00111                      int taskId,
00112                      double /*timeoutTime*/,
00113                      bool /*killOnTimeout*/)
00114 {
00115        int retVal = IProcessor::TS_NONE;
00116 
00117        if (taskId >= 0){
00118               TaskToStateMap::iterator foundIter = m_taskToStateMap.find(taskId);
00119               if (foundIter != m_taskToStateMap.end()){
00120                      retVal = foundIter->second;
00121 
00122                      m_taskToStateMap.erase(foundIter);
00123               }
00124        }
00125        else{
00126               for (         TaskToStateMap::const_iterator iter = m_taskToStateMap.begin();
00127                                    iter != m_taskToStateMap.end();
00128                                    ++iter){      // we are looking for worst status value. This values are sorted worst => bigger.
00129                      int taskState = iter->second;
00130                      if (taskState > retVal){
00131                             retVal = taskState;
00132                      }
00133               }
00134 
00135               this->ResetAllTasks();
00136        }
00137 
00138        return retVal;
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 template <class Base>
00143 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::GetReadyTask()
00144 {
00145        if (!m_taskToStateMap.empty()){
00146               return m_taskToStateMap.begin()->first;
00147        }
00148        else{
00149               return -1;
00150        }
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 template <class Base>
00155 int TSyncProcessorWrap<Base>::GetTaskState(int taskId) const
00156 {
00157        int retVal = IProcessor::TS_NONE;
00158 
00159        if (taskId >= 0){
00160               TaskToStateMap::const_iterator foundIter = m_taskToStateMap.find(taskId);
00161               if (foundIter != m_taskToStateMap.end()){
00162                      retVal = foundIter->second;
00163               }
00164        }
00165        else{
00166               for (         TaskToStateMap::const_iterator iter = m_taskToStateMap.begin();
00167                                    iter != m_taskToStateMap.end();
00168                                    ++iter){      // we are looking for worst status value. This values are sorted worst => bigger.
00169                      int taskState = iter->second;
00170                      if (taskState > retVal){
00171                             retVal = taskState;
00172                      }
00173               }
00174        }
00175 
00176        return retVal;
00177 }
